component.name: MovieItem
component.script:
sub Init() m.title = m.top.findNode("title") m.poster = m.top.findNode("moviePoster")
maxSize = m.top.getParent().itemSize
m.poster.width = int(maxSize[0]) - 4 m.poster.height = m.poster.width * 1.5
m.title.width = m.poster.width m.title.height = int(maxSize[1]) - m.poster.height m.title.translation = [0, m.poster.height] end sub
function itemContentChanged() as void ' re-declare this because init doesnt re-run ' when we come back from elsewhere m.title = m.top.findNode("title") m.poster = m.top.findNode("moviePoster")
itemData = m.top.itemContent m.title.text = itemData.title m.poster.uri = itemData.posterUrl end function
